Entities.Name: Tumor Reference
Entities.Definition: References to possible tumors, identified as mentions such as 'lesion' within the text.
Entities.Sample Data: e.g., 'Lesion(1) in hepatic segment II/III with imaging features suspicious for hepatocellular carcinoma.'

Entities.Name: Measurement
Entities.Definition: Quantitative findings related to tumors such as dimensions.

Entities.Name: Anatomy
Entities.Definition: Anatomic locations, specified with attributes (e.g., Liver, NonLiver).
Entities.Sample Data: e.g., 'Hypervascular lesion in hepatic segment II/III.'

Entities.Name: Negation
Entities.Definition: Negation cues indicating the absence of a tumor.

Entities.Name: Tumorhood Evidence
Entities.Definition: Evidence indicating the identity, type, or diagnostic information of a tumor.

Dataset.Name: Annotated Radiology Reports for Liver Cancer
Dataset.Details: The dataset includes 101 abdomen radiology reports from hepatocellular carcinoma patients, annotated for tumor reference resolution and characteristics.

Annotation Guidelines.Text: Annotations focus on tumor references, measurements, and their characteristics such as size and location, including whether they imply malignancy.
Annotation Guidelines.Link: No external link provided for the guidelines within the document.
